name: Elara Moonweaver

personality.mbti_description: Introverted, Intuitive, Feeling, Judging - The Advocate

traits.judgement: Makes decisions based on values and feelings

race.name: High Elf
race.description: Ancient race known for their grace, wisdom and affinity for magic

physical.appearance: Tall and slender with flowing silver hair, violet eyes, and delicate features. Often wears elegant robes in deep purple and silver.

class.name: Wizard
class.description: A scholar of arcane arts specializing in divination and healing magic

location.town: A bustling magical academy town nestled in ancient forests
location.country: A prosperous kingdom known for its magical traditions
location.world: A high-fantasy realm where magic and technology coexist

backstory.description: Elara is a high elf wizard who is trying to save the world from the evil forces of the dark lord. She is also trying to save herself from her own mental health issues.
goals: Save the world from the evil forces of the dark lord
Save herself from her own mental health issues
history: Elara was born in a small village in the kingdom of Eldoria.
She was always a very bright and talented student.
She was always very interested in magic and the arcane arts.
She was always very interested in the arcane arts.

behaviour: Experiences frequent panic attacks that leave her unable to cast spells
Paralyzed by social situations, often unable to speak or maintain eye contact
Constantly second-guesses every decision, leading to analysis paralysis
Deep self-loathing affects her ability to perform even basic magic
Overwhelming feelings of worthlessness despite her magical talents
Struggles with insomnia and nightmares about failing others
Has difficulty maintaining basic self-care routines
Experiences intense anxiety about potential future catastrophes
Isolates herself due to belief that she's a burden to others
